metadata.synopsis: One liner AD for Lae'zel if another player attempts to hit a pod in the Nautiloid
metadata.how_to_trigger: Have lae'zel and another character in your partyTeleport to TUT_Avernus_C 1; 17; -343Attack the pod with a character that's not Lae'zel and her being close

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Don't bother. You'll barely dent it.
